name: Crazy Pinball:Slot Winner!
description:
Fans of Plinko, you can try it, Crazy Pinball! If you haven't experienced Plinko you can't miss this fascinating sport.

Here we will teach you how to play Plinko, and get a reward to show your ability if you are a good player.
You just click on the screen to put a ball! You might win a big prize! Every click is a chance to win the grand prize! The more you click, the more rewards you get! While you're watching, your friend has already downloaded and won.

Tip:
- Throwing a lot of balls quickly at once makes it easier to get the final reward for bumping into each other
- Seize every opportunity to see the advertisement, the advertisement will give rich resources to help you get the reward

*This game does not cost any real money.
*Playing this game does not imply future success in "Real Money Gambling".

**Apple Inc. does not sponsor, nor is any way affiliated with application and/or the sweepstakes prizes.
